mapper.select: SELECT s.stadium_name, g.gather_date AS gather_date, COUNT(*) AS player_cnt, gather_announcement,g.gather_id ,t.team_logo FROM gather g JOIN stadium s ON g.stadium_id = s.stadium_id JOIN player p ON p.gather_id = g.gather_id JOIN team t on t.team_id = g.team_id WHERE g.team_id = #{team_id} AND DATE(g.gather_date) =DATE(#{gather_date}) GROUP BY gather_date, s.stadium_name;
SELECT * FROM gather g inner join stadium s on g.stadium_id = s.stadium_id WHERE gather_id =#{gather_id}
